EmailTemplate.name: Middle School info
EmailTemplate.subject: St Andrew's Cathedral School
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
In the meantime, I've attached some links to videos and information for you and [ ] to have a look at that offer an insight into our Middle School culture and cohort:
This video - Middle School Matters - has interviews with both staff and students; This video sees our Head of Middle School, Mr David Smith, speaking about our Middle School philosophy and supportive learning culture; and There is further Middle School information on our website.
You can keep up-to-date with what’s happening at St Andrew’s via our Facebook page and you can gain more of an insight into our school culture by watching more of our videos here.
If I can be of any further assistance, please feel free to contact me directly on 9286 9552.
Regards
Robyn
Robyn Pedley Enrolments Administrative Assistant
St Andrew's Cathedral School
Sydney Square, Sydney NSW 2000, Australia
direct 9286 9552 mobile 0404 884 852 email RPedley@sacs.nsw.edu.au phone +61 2 9286 9500 fax +61 29286 9550
